lessons.japanese: 俺は彼を射殺してやる。
俺の力を見くびるなよ。
誰にも俺のことはわからない。
「実を言うと、俺、高所恐怖症なんだ」「臆病者っ！」
lessons.english: "To tell you the truth, I am scared of heights." "You are a coward!"

lessons.japanese: 「トランプやりたい」「俺も俺も！」
lessons.english: "I feel like playing cards." "So do I."

lessons.japanese: 君にお金をあげるから俺が必要なのか。
lessons.english: Do you need me to give you some money?

lessons.japanese: 飲み物を俺に頼まないでくれよ。自分で買いにいけばいいだろ。
lessons.english: Stop asking me for a drink! Go get it yourself.
We are cut from the same cloth.

lessons.japanese: 「実を言うと、俺、高所恐怖症なんだ」「臆病者っ！」
lessons.english: "To tell you the truth, I am scared of heights." "You are a coward!"

lessons.japanese: 君にお金をあげるから俺が必要なのか。
lessons.english: Do you need me to give you some money?

lessons.japanese: 飲み物を俺に頼まないでくれよ。自分で買いにいけばいいだろ。
lessons.english: Stop asking me for a drink! Go get it yourself.

lessons.japanese: 俺が言うとおりにやれよ。
lessons.english: You must do as I tell you.

lessons.japanese: 君の車を引き出してくれよ、俺の車が後へ出られないから。
lessons.english: Pull your car out a bit, I can't back my car out.

lessons.japanese: お前の自転車って、俺のと似てるんだよ。
lessons.english: Your bicycle is similar to mine.

lessons.japanese: お前の合羽がなかったら、俺もびしょびしょになってたろうな。
lessons.english: If it had not been for your raincoat, I would have been drenched to the skin.
